home.introBottom: A Osaka based front-end developer passionate about building accessible and user friendly websites.

about.heading: About Me
about.description: I am a front-end developer based in Osaka looking for exciting opportunities. Has Software Development background. Likes to focus on accessibility when developing.

projectsIntro.desc: Here are some of the selected projects that showcase my passion for front-end development.

projects.title: Rawg.io Clone
projects.description: Used Rawg.io API to create an Game Information App that also let you filter games based on genre , title , platform . also having dark and light mode and multi device responsiveness

projects.title: Kanji Dictionary
projects.description: Created an Kanji Disctionary using Open API . it let you search the kanji and see its readings , strokes , all similar readings with sound and dark and light mode

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.description: Create QR Code of any given URL

projects.title: PigGame
projects.description: Created a Two Player Complex Game . Score will Reset to 0 when dice gets 1 so when to switch is the tricky part. and the first to score 100 wins.

projects.title: Guess My Number
projects.description: Created a Number Guessing game . Computer randomly takes a number and you have to guess it before you loose all your points . Computer gives you hint as if its too low or too high

contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.resumeText: For more info, here's my resume
